summary: Completed comprehensive testing of multi-tenant Voice Agent SaaS platform. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend UI flows tested successfully including multi-step registration, Super Admin panel, tenant approval workflow, and German UI implementation.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (100% success)
Multi-step tenant registration with company details
Super Admin login (admin@voiceagent.de / admin123)
Regular user authentication with tenant status check
Tenant approval workflow (pending -> approved)
Super Admin dashboard with statistics
Admin tenant management (view, approve, reject, suspend)
Admin pricing management (create/edit/delete plans and packages)
Admin invoice management and Lexoffice integration setup
Admin settings for Twilio, Sipgate, Lexoffice configuration
User management with 2-user limit per tenant
Calendar connections API
Appointments CRUD operations
Voice processing API with German responses
Conversation history tracking
Usage tracking and billing calculations
Landing page with German UI elements
Multi-step registration form (company -> address -> tax data)
Super Admin panel navigation and functionality
Tenant pending approval page with German messages
Proper routing based on user roles and tenant status
German UI throughout the application
